#  Montana Courses

### A leading online traffic school institute in Montana, NTSI is not your
average driving school. Register for any of our easy-to-complete courses
today!

  *  __Lower your auto insurance
  *  __Satisfy a court requirement
  *  __Work at your own pace around your schedule
  *  __Complete the course from the comfort of your home

Browse Courses

## Courses

  *  __Traffic Survival Workshop (Level 1)
  *  __Aggressive Driving (Level 2)

  *  __Petty Theft Consumer Awareness Workshop
  *  __Safe New Attitude Program (SNAP)

You **must** receive special permission from a court, employer, or insurance
company in order to use these programs. If you take this course and do not
have special permission granted by the court, employer, or insurance company,
you do so strictly on a **voluntary basis**.

## Traffic Survival Workshop Level 1

The Traffic Survival Workshop is a defensive driving program focused on
developing strategies to reduce the risk of collisions and citations on the
road.

  *  __ 4 hour program
  *  __ A compelling alternative to classroom learning for drivers of all ages
  *  __ A detailed program used for diverting or dismissing traffic citations, removal of traffic points, receipt of an insurance discount, an employer requirement, satisfying a court order, or on a volunteer basis.

Objectives:

  *  __ Recognize and reflect on current driving behaviors and, where needed, learn ways to alter negative driving behavior
  *  __ Explains updated and improved defensive driving strategies including how to deal with aggressive drivers

 __

  *  __Works Around Your Schedule
  *  __100% Online  (safe and secure!)
  *  __Start and Stop Whenever You Like

## $19.95

Register Now! __

## Aggressive Driving (Level 2)

The Aggressive Driving program is a defensive driving program aimed at
enabling students to identify patterns of behavior that have led to multiple
citations, license suspension, or chronic-offender status by courts or Ohio
licensing authorities.

  *  __8 hour program
  *  __Focused on raising awareness and knowledge on how to effectively change driving behaviors to avoid future citations
  *  __Designed for individuals with serious offenses, multiple citations or chronic driving issues

Objectives:

  *  __Accepting responsibility for reckless or aggressive driving behaviors
  *  __Examining one’s current lifestyle and other issues that may be a factor in illegal and reckless driving behaviors

 __

  *  __Works Around Your Schedule
  *  __100% Online  (safe and secure!)
  *  __Start and Stop Whenever You Like

## $59.95

Register Now! __

## Petty Theft Consumer Awareness Workshop

The Petty Theft Consumer Awareness Workshop is a program designed at raising
participant knowledge and awareness to the importance of changing their
behaviors and avoid future illegal activities.

  *  __4 hour program
  *  __This course is designed for individuals who have committed various types of theft and similar offenses
  *  __Individuals should be referred by courts, probation officers or diversion program officials.

Objectives:

  *  __Acceptance of personal responsibility for actions that led to arrest or incident that resulted in the required participation in the program
  *  __Developing a plan of personal commitment to avoid future theft-related problems and other illegal activities

 __

  *  __Works Around Your Schedule
  *  __100% Online  (safe and secure!)
  *  __Start and Stop Whenever You Like

## $44.95

Register Now! __

## SNAP – Safe New Attitude Program

A Young Driver Safety Course

Our online version of the classroom SNAP program is a four-hour program for
high-risk drivers between the ages of 16 – 25.  Designed specifically for
novice drivers there is an emphasis on modern day distractions.  We work on
risk taking issues that severely affect driving awareness. Helping students
recognize dangers that inhibit their driving awareness, this is an excellent
program for specialized youth traffic programs and parent/insurance company
referrals.

  *  __ Texting & Phone calls while driving
  *  __ Alcohol & Drug use
  *  __ Focus on proper driving attitude
  *  __ Emphasis on improved decision making

 __

  *  __Works Around Your Schedule
  *  __100% Online  (safe and secure!)
  *  __Start and Stop Whenever You Like

## $39.95

Register Now! __

## Approved by the State of New York, complete our engaging, easy-to-finish NY
Defensive Driving Course Online and the 5-Hour Pre-Licensing Course Online!

  *  __Learn the latest rules and regulations on the roads and highways
  *  __Receive a discount on your auto insurance
  *  __Reduce points on your driving record
  *  __Fulfill first-time license requirements
  *  __Satisfy a court order

## NY Defensive Driving Course

NTSI offers the DMV approved NY Defensive Driving (IPIRP) otherwise known as
accident prevention course anywhere, anytime or in a live classroom with a
certified instructor.

If you are looking to save money and reduce your driving points, NTSI’s New
York Defensive Driving Course qualifies for the New York Internet Point and
Insurance Reduction Program (IPIRP).

There are many reasons to attend NTSI’s New York Defensive Driving Course,
including:

  *  __10% insurance discount (3 years)
  *  __Up to 4 points reduction from your driving record (every 18 months)
  *  __NY State DMV Approved
  *  __100% online — anytime, anywhere
  *  __No final test!

NTSI’s NY Defensive Driving Course contains the most current information on
defensive driving, traffic safety, accident prevention, collision avoidance,
and the dangers of alcohol and drugs.

This course fulfills the 6-hour traffic school requirement for insurance
reduction in the State of New York.

## 5-Hour Pre-Licensing Course Online

This 5-Hour Pre-Licensing Course Online teaches new drivers with the knowledge
and skills they need to become a safer and responsible driver. The price is
$44.95 which includes everything needed to complete the course. There are no
hidden fees.

NTSI’s course is entirely online and meets New York State Department of Motor
Vehicles (NYSDMV) requirements for pre-licensing education. All new drivers
must complete the 5-hour pre-licensing course before scheduling the road test
for their first driver license.
